func.title: goto

param.name: counter
param.desc: New value for the script counter. The next scenario script function called will be ScriptXXX.

func.desc: Sets the script counter for scenario scripts to the specified value. The script counter is responsible for calling the ScriptXXX functions in a scenario script. This does not apply to object scripts - those should be using TimerCall or ActMaps with StartCall/PhaseCall/EndCall.

example.text: A scenario script: a typical flint rain. Every 100 Frames 10 flints are created.
